00039 #include "PortInterface.hpp"
00040 #include "OutputPortInterface.hpp"
00041 #include "InputPortInterface.hpp"
00042 #include <exception>
00043 #include <stdexcept>
00044 
00045 using namespace RTT;
00046 using namespace detail;
00047 using namespace std;
00048 
00049 
00050 OutputPortInterface::OutputPortInterface(std::string const& name)
00051     : PortInterface(name), cmanager(this) { }
00052 
00053 OutputPortInterface::~OutputPortInterface()
00054 {
00055     cmanager.disconnect();
00056 }
00057 
00059 bool OutputPortInterface::connected() const
00060 { return cmanager.connected(); }
00061 
00062 bool OutputPortInterface::disconnect(PortInterface* port)
00063 {
00064     return cmanager.disconnect(port);
00065 }
00066 
00067 void OutputPortInterface::disconnect()
00068 {
00069     cmanager.disconnect();
00070 }
00071 
00072 bool OutputPortInterface::addConnection(ConnID* port_id, ChannelElementBase::shared_ptr channel_input, ConnPolicy const& policy)
00073 {
00074     if ( this->connectionAdded(channel_input, policy) ) {
00075         cmanager.addConnection(port_id, channel_input, policy);
00076         return true;
00077     }
00078     return false;
00079 }
00080 
00081 // This is called by our input endpoint.
00082 bool OutputPortInterface::removeConnection(ConnID* conn)
00083 {
00084     return cmanager.removeConnection(conn);
00085 }
00086 
00087 
00088 void OutputPortInterface::write(DataSourceBase::shared_ptr source)
00089 { throw std::runtime_error("calling default OutputPortInterface::write(datasource) implementation"); }
00090 
00091 bool OutputPortInterface::createDataConnection( InputPortInterface& input, int lock_policy )
00092 { return createConnection( input, ConnPolicy::data(lock_policy) ); }
00093 
00094 bool OutputPortInterface::createBufferConnection( InputPortInterface& input, int size, int lock_policy )
00095 { return createConnection( input, ConnPolicy::buffer(size, lock_policy) ); }
00096 
00097 bool OutputPortInterface::createConnection( InputPortInterface& input )
00098 { return createConnection(input, input.getDefaultPolicy()); }
00099 
00100 bool OutputPortInterface::connectTo(PortInterface* other, ConnPolicy const& policy)
00101 {
00102     InputPortInterface* input  = dynamic_cast<InputPortInterface*>(other);
00103     if (! input)
00104         return false;
00105     return createConnection(*input, policy);
00106 }
00107 
00108 bool OutputPortInterface::connectTo(PortInterface* other)
00109 {
00110     InputPortInterface* input  = dynamic_cast<InputPortInterface*>(other);
00111     if (! input)
00112         return false;
00113     return createConnection(*input);
00114 }
